name: SA:MP GDK 4 For Windows
tagline: This webpage has been created by unofficial build of SA:MP GDK 4 (https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk) made and dedicated for Windows system only.
body:
==================== **How to do working with Visual Studio:** *** 1. Download archive file from above. 2. Unpack the archive to any folder on your hard disk. 3. Set PATH to this folder. 4. In Visual Studio add in **Properties** -> **VC++ Directories** "**_PATH-TO-FOLDER-WITH-EXTRACTED-ARCHIVE_**" (without the quotes), exactly in:

**Executable Directories** - write
**_PATH-TO-FOLDER-WITH-EXTRACTED-ARCHIVE/BIN_**

**Include Directories** - write
**_PATH-TO-FOLDER-WITH-EXTRACTED-ARCHIVE/INCLUDE_**

**Library Directories** write
**_PATH-TO-FOLDER-WITH-EXTRACTED-ARCHIVE/LIB_**

Where **_PATH-TO-FOLDER-WITH-EXTRACTED-ARCHIVE_** can be **C:\Program Files\GDK4\**. *** And it's end. Now you can start writing your own gamemodes!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
